content.text:
# Draft:List of awards and nominations received by KSI

}}
Olajide Olayinka Williams "JJ" Olatunji, better known as KSI, is a British YouTuber and rapper who has received various accolades & nominations throughout his career. He has been nominated at The BRIT Awards, Global Awards, Artist & Manager Awards, and various other award shows.
From 2008, KSI has had a career as a YouTuber which earnt him various nominations for his role in providing entertainment. He has been nominated for a Shorty Award for YouTuber of the Year. He won an award at the NME Awards for Vlogger of the Year. KSI's YouTube group, the Sidemen, have also received various nominations. They received a nominations at the British Book Awards for their book "The Sidemen Book."
From 2015, KSI begun his musical career with the release of his debut single "Lamborghini" which featured rapper P Money. In 2020 KSI's debut album Dissimulation debuted at #2 on the Official UK Charts. KSI earnt his first BRIT nomination with the release of "Lighter" which KSI was featured on along side Nathan Dawe.  Since then, he has been nominated three times at the BRITs.
From 2018, KSI begun his boxing career with his ameture boxing debut against fellow YouTuber Joe Weller at the Copper Box Arena in London. In 2019, himself and Logan Paul heled a professional bout on November 9th at the Staples Center in Los Angeles. Their fight was nominated for "Event of the Year" from The Ring magazine.
In 2023, KSI achieved two Guinness World Records. The first, along side his YouTube group, the Sidemen, achieved the "most viewers for a charity sports match live stream on YouTube." for their annual Sidemen Charity Match. Later that year KSI and Logan Paul achieved "the world's largest piñata" in the form of their Prime Hydration bottle.
Major associations
The BRIT Awards
The BRIT Awards are an award show presented annually by the British Phonographic Industry to honour the finest in musical achievement.
